article_title: The Week in Pictures: Barack’s Big Syrian Adventure Edition
article_text:
“Arise and take our stand for freedom as in the olden time.” Winston Churchill

“Proclaim Liberty throughout All the land unto All the Inhabitants Thereof.” Inscription on the Liberty Bell

og.description: Oh where to begin?  Obama clearly doesn’t have his heart in it.  His fecklessness makes comparisons to Stanley Baldwin and Neville Chamberlain an insult–to Baldwin and Chamberlain.  And…
